# selectableItemsHighlighted

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the interaction highlights actionable text or data the analyzer detects in text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor final var selectableItemsHighlighted: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The interaction object manages this property value for you. It sets this property to `false` if you set the [doc://com.apple.VisionKit/documentation/VisionKit/ImageAnalysisInteraction/analysis] property or the [doc://com.apple.VisionKit/documentation/VisionKit/ImageAnalysisInteraction/activeInteractionTypes] property to an empty set. Otherwise, it sets this property depending on whether a person toggles the Live Text button in the interface.

## Querying the interface state

- **liveTextButtonVisible**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Live Text button appears.
- **isSupplementaryInterfaceHidden**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view hides supplementary interface objects.
- **hasInteractiveItem(at:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether active text, data detectors, or supplementary interface objects exist at the specified point.
- **hasSupplementaryInterface(at:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether supplementary interface objects exist at the specified point.
